column1: NGR is on East side where the inspectors note says "… just before where road from Stanwell to Ashford meets the reservoir embankment"

There are 3 gauges at this location and there are a large number of duplicated readings where that gauges overlap. The duplicated readings are randomly spread over the years and  29% to 38% of the monthly readings are within 0.04 inches of each other. 4 monthly readings are duplicated over all 3 gauges. Whilst the duplications might be suspicious, the randomness of their occurrence and the closeness of the readings across all gauges suggests the readings are generally legitimate.
